short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables communication between your browser and SignalRGB, enabling RGB lighting triggered by actions in the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring dynamic RGB lighting effects to Chrome with this extension. SignalRGB is required to be installed for the lighting effects to function.
